Ker Plunk! is a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude! The object of the game is to skillfully remove the sticks from the tube while dropping the fewest marbles possible. The translucent tube stands upright on a base that contains four separate numbered trays. Each player selects a numbered compartment to use throughout the game, and the straws are passed through holes midway of the tube to form a lattice “web.‚Äù The marbles are then placed in the top of the tube and held in place by the web. Just set it up, start playing and watch out for marbles that go ‚ÄúKer Plunk!‚Äù The players must use steady hands and a cool head to remove the sticks from below the marbles. This best game from yester-year is just as much fun today! Share your great memories or start new ones! You and your friends will have a blast playing Ker Plunk!, just don‚Äôt let the marbles fall! For 2 to 4 players.
Ker Plunk! is a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude!
Create a “lattice”¬†of sticks midway through the translucent tube and place the marbles on top;¬†players choose one of four compartments in the base -2 to 4 people can play!
Players¬†take turns removing sticks while trying to prevent the marbles from dropping through.
The player with the least number of marbles at the end of the game, wins!
A fsvorite game¬†from yester-year that’s¬†just as much fun today!

It‚Äôs a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude!

Kerplunk! has been a family favorite for 50 years — and this beloved game is just as much fun today!

Easy to learn, so much fun to play!

There‚Äôs no reading required to play this cool kids‚Äô game, so it‚Äôs great for kids and parents, alike!

Read more

Simple setup means more playtime!

Simple setup means more playtime!

Just create a web of sticks midway through the translucent tower, then pour the marbles overtop — it‚Äôs so easy!

Keep a steady hand and a cool head!

Players take turns pulling out one stick at a time — be careful not to let the marbles drop!

Don‚Äôt let the marbles go ‘Kerplunk’!

The player with the fewest marbles at the end of the game is the winner!

Read more

Fun competition and silly giggles!

This quick, easy game is the perfect party game for kids 5 years old & up — just don‚Äôt let the marbles drop!

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

LICK MAT RECOMMENDED BY VETS AND TRAINERS – redirect all licking habits and perfect aid to reduce crate training time. Works with all manner of treats and foods, ranging from yogurt, peanut butter and spreadable treats, raw, wet, dry and liquid foods, allowing your pet to enjoy just a small amount of food. LickiMats are a perfect delivery system for supplements, medications and treats. Reinforce good behavior and replace anxiety with a long-lasting treat. Perfect for crate training.
DENTAL HEALTH – LickiMat textured surfaces promote pleasurable licking action, which generates saliva helping protect your pet‚Äôs teeth and gums. Scrapes food pieces and odor-causing pieces off your pet‚Äôs tongue, promoting healthier teeth, gums and fresher breath.
SERVE HEALTHY TREATS ‚Äì Serve yogurt, peanut butter, pur√©es, spreads and all manner of organic and healthy treats. Food settles in the mat‚Äôs surface which slows the feeding dramatically and prolongs enjoyment. Less calories, healthier treats and longer duration. THREE SURFACE PATTERNS: LickiMat Playdate (Squares) is perfect for small kibble, raw meat or fish. LickiMat Soother (Dots) for runny foods, and Buddy (Crosses) for chunky spreadable treats.
ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY AND SAFE: NO SILICONE. PLEASE SUPERVISE YOUR PET. THIS IS NOT A CHEW TOY. Please supervise your pet. If you have a puppy or known chewer, please order a LickiMat Tuff. It is very strong and 100% dishwasher safe. Licking, Lick Pad, Snuffle Mat.

Add to your family game collection today with this perfect 6 game assortment from Pressman. This convenient all-in-one set features iconic favorites including Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Tic-Tac-Toe, Snakes & Ladders, and Pahrcheesi. Enjoy high-quality plastic components, including interlocking Checker pieces, full-sized Staunton Chess pieces, and much more for endless classic fun. For 2 or more players, ages 8 and up.
CHESS: A board game of strategic skill for two players, played on a checkered board. Each player begins the game with sixteen pieces that are moved and used to capture opposing pieces according to precise rules. The object is to put the opponent’s king under a direct attack from which escape is impossible. Also known as Checkmate.
CHECKERS: Checkers is a strategy board game for two players which involves diagonal moves of uniform game pieces and mandatory captures by jumping over opponent pieces.
BACKGAMMON: Backgammon is one of the oldest known board games. Its history can be traced back nearly 5,000 years to archaeological discoveries in Mesopotamia, modern-day Iraq. It is a two-player game where each player has fifteen pieces that move between twenty-four triangles according to the roll of two dice.
SNAKES & LADDERS: Snakes and ladders, known originally as Moksha Patam, is an ancient Indian board game for two or more players regarded today as a worldwide classic. It is played on a game board with numbered, gridded squares. A number of “ladders” and “snakes” are pictured on the board, each connecting two specific board squares.
TIC TAC TOE: A game in which two players seek, in alternate turns, to complete a row, a column, or a diagonal with either three O’s or three X’s placed in the spaces of a grid of nine squares.
PAHRCHEESI: Pahrcheesi is a race game for four players. The goal is for each player to move their pieces from the starting position (the circles in the corners) to the home square (in the center of the board), passing a nearly complete loop around the board in the counter-clockwise direction before going up towards the main row.

Classic 6 Game Collection by Pressman, Ages 8 and Up, 2 Players

Add to your family game collection today with this perfect 6 game assortment from Pressman. This convenient all-in-one set features iconic favorites including Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Tic-Tac-Toe, Snakes & Ladders, and Pahrcheesi. Enjoy high-quality plastic components, including interlocking Checker pieces, full-sized Staunton Chess pieces, and much more for endless classic fun. For 2 or more players, ages 8 and up.

Bean Bag Toss

Description Add to your family game collection today with this perfect 6 game assortment from Pressman. This convenient all-in-one set features iconic favorites including Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Tic-Tac-Toe, Snakes & Ladders, and Pahrcheesi. This timeless game is perfect for indoor or outdoor fun! A staple for your next tailgate or barbecue, this set has everything you need to start playing. Features a sturdy plastic game base, 6 bean bags, scoring labels, and complete instructions. Game night is about to take a twist with Michigan Rummy by Pressman. This game blends the classic gameplay of rummy and poker to form an entirely new experience. Includes 96 colorful playing chips, a 14-inch playing board, and complete instructions. Introduce your family to a new way to play the old classic game of dominoes! Play all the dominoes from your hand onto one or more chains, or “trains,” leading from a central hub. Can’t play? Use the colorful trains to mark the end of your turn. This classic Double Six Color Dot Dominoes from Pressman is perfect for the avid domino player. The high-quality dominoes are finished with dots in rich, bold colors and fit snugly in this vintage style tin box for easy, stylish storage.

Bring the adventure to life with Jumanji The Game, the latest edition of the legendary board game. You and your band of brave adventurers suddenly find yourselves deep in a mysterious jungle full of secrets and surprises. Danger lies along your path, threatening to take away your 3 precious Life Tokens. Your goal is to reach Jumanji (the center) and call out its name, but beware: if any of your group runs out of Life Tokens, everyone loses! On each turn, roll dice and move along the path, using the Green Dome to reveal a riddle. Solve the riddle correctly and move an extra space. End your turn by drawing a Challenge card to see what difficulties Jumanji has in store for you. You might have to act out a story of your adventures, or race to solve a challenge. Be careful or you may lose a Life Token! Reach the center with at least one Life Token left per player and yell ‚ÄúJUMANJI!‚Äù ‚Äì you‚Äôve just won for the whole group! Jumanji The Game is the exciting adventure game to play with friends and family on your next game night. For 2 to 4 players, ages 8 and up
DO NOT BEGIN UNLESS YOU INTEND TO FINISH! Jumanji The Board Game takes you and your fellow adventurers on a quest through the jungle, solving riddles and completing challenges while trying not to lose your Life Tokens.
WORK TOGETHER, WIN TOGETHER: Each player races to be the first to reach the center of the jungle and yell ‚ÄúJUMANJI!‚Äù to win. But if ANY player loses all their Life Tokens, ALL players lose!
SOLVE RIDDLES AND CHALLENGES: Each turn delivers new riddles to solve and challenges to complete. Escape dangers, race against the clock, and tell exciting stories to keep moving forward!
SPIN MASTER PUZZLES, TOYS & GAMES: A world of jigsaw puzzles and the best family board games for kids, teens, and adults. Plus strategy games, card games, and classic board games like dominoes, mahjong, chess, or a backgammon set.
FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY: Next time you get together with family and friends, bring along a Spin Master game. The perfect activity for memorable game nights, birthdays, dinner parties, vacations, holiday & Christmas gifts, and any time you just want to have fun!

JUMANJI

THE GAME

On each turn, roll dice and move along the path, using the Green Dome to reveal a riddle. Solve the riddle correctly and move an extra space. End your turn by drawing a Challenge card to see what difficulties Jumanji has in store for you.

BE PREPARED

You might have to act out a story of your adventures, or race to solve a challenge. Be careful or you may lose a Life Token!

PLAY FOR YOUR LIFE

Reach the center with at least one Life Token left per player and yell ‚ÄúJUMANJI!‚Äù ‚Äì you‚Äôve just won for the whole group! Jumanji The Game is the exciting adventure game to play with friends and family on your next game night.

QUICK FACTS

  • Based on the Movie!
  • 2 to 4 Players
  • Ages 8 and up

Read more

JUMANJI COMES TO REAL LIFE

Bring the adventure to life with Jumanji The Game, the latest edition of the legendary board game. In this game, you must work together to win together!

DO NOT BEGIN…

You and your band of brave adventurers suddenly find yourselves deep in a mysterious jungle full of secrets and surprises. Danger lies along your path, threatening to take away your Life Tokens.

UNLESS YOU INTEND TO FINISH

Your goal is to reach Jumanji (the center) and call out its name, but beware: if any of your group runs out of Life Tokens, everyone loses!

GAME INCLUDES

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:21 UTC – Details)

From the brand

ABOUT ANCEL

ANCEL is committed to solving automotive aftermarket

problems cost-effectively,efficiently and conveniently.

Our Vision

We strive to make friends with our customers with excellent products and quality services, and to be the company most trusted by our customers.

Our Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Our Value

The company constantly strives for product quality, technology, design and sustainability and adheres to the spirit of people-oriented and innovative efforts to make great contributions in the field of automotive technology.

Black Friday Deals

EVAP SMOKE MACHINES SERIES

HEAVY TRUCK SCAN TOOL SERIES

CAR BATTERY TESTER SERIES

CEL Doctor: The ANCEL AD310 is one of the best-selling OBD II scanners on the market and is recommended by Scotty Kilmer, a YouTuber and auto mechanic. It can easily determine the cause of the check engine light coming on, quickly read and clear diagnostic trouble codes, read live data & hard memory data, view freeze frame, I/M monitor readiness and collect vehicle information. Instead of taking car to mechanic shop, you can use it to check the trouble code and show code definition by yourself.
Sturdy and Compact: Equipped with a 2.5 foot cable made of very thick, flexible insulation. It is important to have a sturdy scanner as it can easily fall to the ground when working in a car. The AD310 OBD2 scanner is a well-constructed device with a sleek design. It weighs 12 ounces and measures 8.9 x 6.9 x 1.4 inches. Thanks to its compact design and light weight, transporting the device is not a problem. The buttons are clearly labelled and the screen is large and displays results clearly.
Accurate Fast and Easy to Use: The AD310 scanner can help you or your mechanic understand if your car is in good condition, provides exceptionally accurate and fast results, reads and clears engine trouble codes in seconds. If you want to find out the cause of the check engine light, this device will let you know immediately and fix the problem right away without any car knowledge. No need for batteries or a charger, get power directly from the OBDII Data Link Connector in your vehicle.
OBDII Protocols and Car Compatibility: Many cheap scan tools do not really support all OBD2 protocols. This is not the case with the AD310 scanner as it can support all OBDII protocols such as KWP2000, J1850 VPW, ISO9141, J1850 PWM and CAN. This device also has extensive vehicle compatibility with 1996 US-based, 2000 EU-based and Asian cars, light trucks, SUVs, as well as newer OBD2 and CAN vehicles both domestic and foreign. Check compatibility with your vehicle model before purchasing.
Home Necessity and Worthy to Own: This is an excellent code reader to travel or home with as it weighs less and it is compact in design. You can easily slide it in your backpack as you head to the garage, or put it on the dashboard, this will be a great fit for you. The AD310 is not only portable, but also accurate and fast in performance. Moreover, it covers various car brands and is suitable for people who just need a code reader to check their car.


Previous page

  1. Read & clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs), identify and address check engine light (CEL) issues.

  2. Just plug it into your car's OBD II port, turn on the ignition, and you are ready to go.

  3. Works on most 1996 and newer vehicles (cars, light trucks, minivans and SUVs) sold in North America.

  4. Even a beginner can operate this device, no car knowledge required.

  5. Insulated cables and a rugged plastic case protect your device from the elements in your workplace.

Next page

1 Main Features 2 Connectivity 3 Vehicle Compatibility 4 Easy To Use 5 Quality Construction

6 Extra Features You Should Know About

Previous page

  1. Enhanced Functions

    It can do essential work like resetting monitors, CEL issues, and clearing codes. It can also read live data, collect vehicle information, freeze data and display code definitions on the screen.

  2. Impressive Build Quality

    Each product must undergo a 48-hour aging test before leaving the factory. This helps reduce the chance of components on the PCB falling off during shipping and extends the life of the product.

  3. Patent-Protected

    All ANCEL product designs have independent patents and intellectual property rights, and the products also comply with CE, FCC and other relevant certification standards.

  4. Cost-Effectiveness

    Instead of going to a mechanic, car owners can do some basic maintenance themselves by learning some basic skills and buying the right tools like the AD310 scanner, which can cut costs significantly.

  5. Exhaustive Car Checkups

    With ANCEL AD310 OBD2 scanner, you can read and clear trouble codes in any OBD2-compliant vehicle, domestic or foreign, as long as it was manufactured after 1996, in Europe and Asia after 2000.

  6. SMOG Check Helper

    You can use the AD310 OBD2 scanner to make sure the monitor has been set before you take it to emissions test, helps you pass a vehicle SMOG check easily.

Next page

A battery or battery charger is not required. Once connected to your vehicle's 16-pin OBDII DLC, the unit will turn on and prompt you to start the ignition. If your vehicle has a check engine light on, the AD310 scanner is the first tool that can help you determine the cause and find a solution.

Find More ANCEL AD310 Scanner Reviews On Social Media

Where's the OBDII interface?

The OBD2 port is often under the dash, or under a panel below the handbrake in the central console.

How to get started?

Key operation: 1. turn the ignition on without starting the car; 2. Start the car.

Keyless operation: 1. press start button - press again (do not press brake pedal) - insert tool and read; 2. press brake pedal and start button.

Why I can't erase the fault code?

The fault causing the fault code to show will need to be repaired first then code can be erased.

Will it diagnose ABS or SRS?

Unfortunately, no. The main function of AD310 scanner is to detect the engine system, read and clear the fault codes, but Ancel AD610 can do ABS and SRS.

What should I pay attention to before buying?

Two things you should know: 1. it works only on cars with 12V battery; 2. your car must be standard OBD II protocol (16pin DLC).
